amendment.description: To provide funds for science, engineering, technology, and mathematics related activities.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3268 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3268 proposed by Senator Mikulski. (consideration: CR S12750; text: CR S12750) To provide funds for science, engineering, technology, and mathematics related activities.
